news_header: The Nobel Prize for Literature and Peace will be announced soon, with recent awards given for protein research and AI advancements in predicting protein structures.
news_text: Following the recent Nobel Prize announcements, the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences awarded the Nobel Prize for Protein Research to David Baker, Demis Hassabis, and John M. Jumper. Hassabis and Jumper developed an AI model, AlphaFold2, which predicts complex protein structures, aiding in understanding antibiotics and creating new medicines. Baker expressed excitement about the impact of AI on protein development. Other Nobel Prizes in Science were awarded in Medicine and Physics, with the Nobel Peace Prize and Economics Prize announcements upcoming. Winners will receive their awards at the Nobel Gala in December.
